nodes.label: The first room
nodes.summary: A simple room with information placqards on one wall.
nodes.description: This room is completely unadorned, save for a gigantic information diagram on the east wall. There is a single door leading out of the room.

tooltips.information: You can hover over words like this to get more information
tooltips.door: This door leads to the next room. Hover over that room in the map view to see what might be inside.

nodes.label: The second room
nodes.description: This room is festooned with gaudy decorations. Nearly every surface is covered with some kind of intricate pattern.

tooltips.decorations: Sometimes there will be hidden information in these descriptions
tooltips.pattern: One repeated motif is a series of colors arranged in a circle, each color signifying a different region of the landscape.
